PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordens de compra
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_ORDENSCOMPRA.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.FORNECEDOR=@RASTRO(GN_PESSOAS) AND A.HANDLE IN (SELECT ORDEMCOMPRA FROM
CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS WHERE HANDLE IN (SELECT ORDEMCOMPRAITEM FROM
LC_AQUISICAOITENS WHERE HANDLE=@RASTRO(LC_AQUISICAOITENS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1529_at3634_hs7a05edad.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
